attributes.action: make it an offence punishable by points & a fine to hog the 2nd or 3rd lane of the motorway when the other lanes are free!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: people get fined and 3 points for undertaking on a motorway, which should  be abolished as if there is room to undertake there is room for the vehicle hogging the outer lane to move in and allow the other vehicle to pass

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
